@GET
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getConsent​(@PathParam("clientId")

        Returns the consent for the client with the given client id.
        Parameters:
        clientId - client id to return the consent for
        Returns:

      • revokeConsent

@DELETE
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response revokeConsent​(@PathParam("clientId")
                                               String clientId)
        Deletes the consent for the client with the given client id.
        Parameters:
        clientId - client id to delete a consent for
        Returns:
        returns 202 if deleted

      • grantConsent

        @Path("/applications/{clientId}/consent")
@POST
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response grantConsent​(@PathParam("clientId")
                                              String clientId,
                                              ConsentRepresentation consent)
        Creates or updates the consent of the given, requested consent for the client with the given client id. Returns the appropriate REST response.
        Parameters:
        clientId - client id to set a consent for
        consent - requested consent for the client
        Returns:
        the created or updated consent

        Returns:
